评论详情: I got the color block blue one, and I don't know if this review applies too all colors/styles. This sweater is super comfortable but definitely has a couple major issues. It shrunk a bit when washed, so even though I bought a size up, the sleeves are now too short. Here's the biggest issue: it pills like CRAZY. I have a pill shaver and it literally needs to be shaved FIVE TIMES after EVERY wash. I don't know how there's any sweater left at this point. I've shaved enough off to have knitted another entire sweater. I really wish it didn't shrink and pill, because other than those two glaring issues, it's a great sweater. If pills bother you, DO NOT get this sweater.
Really great quality and adorable!
This sweater looks exactly as it does in the picture, it has a perfect slightly oversized fit and the pattern is great.
Great quality sweater! It’s thick and the cow is cute. I absolutely love it!

I absolutely love this sweater.  Good quality and super comfy.  Oversized in a perfect way.  I am 6'0" 175 lbs and the large is a little big on me.  As I wanted it to be.  Super fun sweater.  Everyone needs one.

评论概述: Nice sweater but NOT made of cotton
评论详情: The listing and the tag on the garment say 100% cotton, but it's pretty obvious this sweater is made of polyester or a poly/nylon blend. *Maybe* there is a small percentage of cotton content, but I doubt it. That said, if you are OK with those non-natural materials it's a nice sweater of reasonable quality. The seams are not knit in; it is sewn together, but everything lines up and the way the duck is accented with a 3-D stitch is very cute. The yarn is soft and this is a very thick and warm sweater. The neckline is a bit higher than a crew neck, more like a mock neck style. I normally wear a women's size L or XL. The men's medium fits me well. Slightly oversized in shoulders and length but sleeves hit right at my wrists.
This was a gift and it was well received.
We bought this for my daughter because she loves ducks and she loved this sweater.
Thicker than I like personally but very well made & super warm not itchy

Very well made. Thick!  This is a very cute sweater great my 18 year old put on his Amazon wish list for Christmas.  I was so shocked because typically he wears black Rock back tshirts. Happy to purchase for him!  Get it; it’s cute!
I bought this as a Christmas gift. It is a very nice, thick sweater with a cute print. I don't know how well it washes as it has yet to be opened and worn.

I just opened my package and was pleasantly surprised by how nice this sweater is. It is actually very good quality and a bit of a thick material. The duck itself is another material which is cool because it gives it a soft but textured look. The color is pretty accurate in the ad photo. It fits great too. I am a 5’3 woman 125 lbs and ordered the small. It is oversized but not overdone. Overall great buy upon first impression and will definitely be buying more from this shop if it ends up washing well and taking wear well.
Ordered a men’s medium and it’s definitely a large/XL

Pale pink is not one of my preferred colors, but this sweater is one of my favorites regardless. It's soft, thick, and very warm. It didn't shrink in the wash. The knife-wielding duck makes me smile every time I wear it. Definitely one of the best sweaters I've found on Amazon! I like my sweaters oversized so an XL was perfect.
Loved this sweater, it's hilarious. But it is a bit too big. I did expect the oversized look, but it's a lot lol
I ordered a M for a person who barely wears a medium. When they say oversized they mean it! I had to reorder in Small and it’s still very large! But it’s very nice!
Umm, just brilliant. Wow.
Cute but staticky and also the cut on the neck was very high.
Super thick and cozy, bought as a gift for my sister-in-law and she loved it!

评论概述: A great value for the price
评论详情: I was super hesitant to buy this, because I'm somewhere between an XL and an XXL. I'm so happy I took a chance, because it's so much better than I expected! The duck is a different material than the rest of the sweater, giving it a 3D look. Everyone loves it, and it's pretty darn soft for the price. Overall a great find!
For anyone that’s like a size large in women’s the medium should fit, but really it depends on your height Im pretty small. The sweater is fun to wear and it feels nice.
How adorable, the quality of the sweater was better the expected! It was a little scratch to wear but fine with an undershirt
I'm a woman, bought this in my size because its adorable. Sweater is thick, cozy, high quality material, beautiful design.  It fit well and I love it.
Thought this would be super cute - the fabric is very scratchy. The stitching pulled easily. The design was off (knife looked weird). Returned.

Th is sweater was given as a gift last Christmas.  The recipient was delighted with it.  This is a quality sweater.  The color is actually between a very soft yellow and beige.  I liked it so much I ordered one for myself.  Everytime I wear it, people ask where to buy it.  Great sweater for either men or women.
Good quality, oversize on me (a woman) but small isn't too huge for that oversize look. This is now one of my faves. Thought it was a duck with knife, but its a straight razor. Even better.
It's so fabulous and funny. And soft!

Love the oversized comfy look and being 5’0 and 115lb’s, it’s easy to drown in bigger sweaters but size small was perfect! I cuffed the sleeves twice and I am in love. The colors on the sweater are so darn cute and the sweater itself is comfy! Will definitely be purchasing more from here!
My daughter loves the sweater. It fits well and is so cute!
I was so excited to open this package. It looks great and great quality. Will be the talk of the party
Very warm and comfortable to wear. I get compliments every time I wear it.
Very cute
My granddaughter loved it.

评论概述: Very cute, soft, and a nice oversized sweater. Sweater material will make you itch a bit
评论详情: The sweater is nice and big and looks good. Duck on it looks good too. Only issue that I've had with it so far is that it can really make you itch. Otherwise it's a nice and cozy oversized sweater.
Accurate sizing and comfortable too!
my partner LOVES this sweater and he gets compliments everywhere he wears it! the material is shockingly soft for something within my budget. pleasantly surprised!
I bought my daughter a small and she loves it. She asked for it as a Christmas gift and she was so excited when she saw it.
My wife is 6'0 and a large was perfect. She likes her sweaters a little big do this was perfect. She loved the fabric of the sweater and the goose so overall great gift.
so many compliments from all ages, i’d say it’s a success

By far one of the greater sweaters I have gotten. Loved it so much that I bought a second one and my brother and SIL bought them in blue and we all wore them to Thanksgiving for my mom's family photos. The duck is adorable and I love the cotton tuft fabric it's made out of. The sweater is warm and extremely comfortable to wear (even on a holiday like Thanksgiving where your belly expands five times it's normal size). It does great in the washer and dryer and doesn't shrink. It does state it's oversized and it's one that truly is oversized and I love the baggier style of it.

This oversized sweater from Laixton is an absolute gem. Initially, I picked it up as a fun, light-hearted gift, but it's turned out to be so much more. My girlfriend adores it, and truth be told, it looks fantastic when worn. Sure, like any fluffy knit, it's prone to those little burbles, but that's par for the course with this type of material. What's really surprising is how this jumper has taken on a life of its own. It's not just a piece of clothing anymore; it's become a symbol between us, a cherished item that holds much more sentimental value than I ever imagined. It's remarkable how a simple sweater can transcend its initial purpose and become a treasured part of our story.
It’s super cute, but it’s already fraying and leaving holes after a couple days. not worth the money

Got this in an XL, I had to cuff the sleeves twice because I have pretty short arms. I’m 5’4” and this is long enough that it would cover everything if you’re a leggings fan. Incredibly soft, not scratchy at all. Very good quality stitching and fabric. If you want this to be a little more fem you could size down and it will be more fitted, but the XL is true to size if you like a less fitted look.

This is a high quality sweater with good sewing.  I can't see my son wearing the duck -however, it is fine for me.  I like the large size - and the warmth will do well as the weather here is turning cold.
The material is heavier than I expected. The pink color is nice. Looks better than the picture advertised.
I ordered this for my lady during the holidays, fits perfectly and keeps her warm! I’ll definitely be ordering her different designs in the future
A heavy sweater, and very well-made. You could probably only wear this on the very coldest of days it’s a lot thicker than I expected!

This graphic sweater is so warm and cute!! I'm always hesitant to buy clothes online, because I can't feel the texture, but this sweater is amazing! I'm a 5'77" and 143.3 lbs and I ordered a beige in small, it's so cute, soft and warm, it looks just like the pictures. I was very satisfied with how soft and warm it is. It’s exactly what I was looking for. Very good quality for the price! ! I would definitely recommend it!!
Fits beautifully
I got this, it fit, I cut the tags off and within 2 hours of wearing it it started to unravel.
A heavy sweater, and very well-made. You could probably only wear this on the very coldest of days it’s a lot thicker than I expected!

It's comfortable, it's cozy, there is a goose brandishing a knife on the front of it. I'm not sure what else needs to be said really.  It's wool, so it's expected to be just a bit scratchy, but it's soft enough that you don't really notice it. The fit is loose and comfy, but still feels like you're wearing a hug. If you've never washed wool before, you're going to want to make sure your washing machine has a wool setting. If it doesn't then you'll want to hand wash this bad boy.  It's probably the coolest sweater I'll ever own, and I can say with 100% certainty that anyone who wears this automatically becomes cooler by an order of magnitude.
AMZING!! And for the price really worth it!!

评论概述: One of My Friend’s Favorite Gifts
评论详情: This sweater is soft and warm and perfectly slouchy if you’re a smaller woman in a size small. It’s advertised for men here, but if you also have a female friend that’s a little bit odd, has a sense of humor and loves birds this makes a great, entirely unexpected gift. Even better if they have no clue about the game this is based on.

THIS IS AMAZING! GOOD QUALITY AND BEAUTIFUL! MANY COMPLIMENTS AND MUCH LOVE TOWARDS THIS THING! WORTH THE MONEY!  In all realness, the quality is really good, the over sizing is really good. I got a medium and it fits so nicely. And I’m short, but the length is really nice. I dress modestly, and this length worked in my favor, but it may have been bc I’m short. The material is nice and thick. Genuinely one of my all time favorite prices of clothing. Might be buried in
Not a fan of the clear zip lock style bag this was shipped in but this thing do be comfy.
Bought as gift. Love the graphic and fit on young girl. Warm & comfy. Oversized but good look. Washed & dried well.

Initially we were excited when it finally arrived (later than expected). My teenager loved it and wore it right away. We washed it once according to the directions and laid it flat to air dry. The knitted goose design has started to unravel. We were unhappy, especially since it had only been worn two times before it started to fall apart.  BUT, I wrote to the seller LAIXTON and received great communication from them about wanting to make us happy. We received a replacement item and we are very thankful for their great customer service.
Very cute design! Nice quality, nice fit. Very soft and comfortable sweater. Synthetic fiber which is fine because wool is too warm for Texas.
I'm honestly not sure why these are so highly reviewed I bought two goose sweaters, these are bulky and made of a very uncomfortable material. I returned both.

I absolutely love this sweater from the bottom of my heart. I've been looking for a sweater shaped like this and that's more intentionally over-sized and because of my body type it's been hard, but this is PERFECT!! I got a large and it fits perfectly oversized. Not too tight anywhere, including the arms. It's only a little bit itchy but after a wash or too that should go away. :) The graphic looks great on it as well. My only gripe with this sweater is that the delivery time kept on changing.
Such a cute & funny sweater. It's a bit heavy & it's thick so it's perfect for winter.

This is one of the best quality items I’ve ever purchased from Amazon! My daughter loves it! It’s very thick and soft. The goose is not an appliqué it is made into the sweater and the inside remains soft. Very pleased!

I was a little hesitant to order this because I have not heard of this brand before, but I loved the design, so I took the risk. 100% worth it. The quality is great, not itchy at all, and the stitching is secure. It was a big hit when I wore it out.

This is a great oversized sweater that not only has a cool unique design but is also warm. It had a great thickness and is soft on the skin. The stitching of the image looks great and blends right with the stitching of the sweater itself. It’s a great sweater.

评论概述: The clothes are comfortable and soft.
评论详情: It's a lovely dress. It's warm and comfortable to wear. The most important thing is that the ducklings are cute. I like it very much.

I named mine Gus the Goose. That just felt like vital information to include in my review. Anyways, I am 5”8 and weigh around 145 for reference. This sweater is big on me which is EXACTLY what I wanted. It’s cozy but best worn with a long sleeve underneath because it is itchy. My only issue with it is that it snags SUPER easy.
My 12 y.o loves this sweater. Its funny. Fits her sense of humor. Sizing runs a bit big.
Awesome sweater and the duck wielding the knife is an awesome design! Overall, the texture is soft and it is true to size. If you want the oversized effect, I would order one size larger.

评论概述: Literally the softest thing I ever felt in my life
评论详情: This sweater is literally softer than a kitten, it’s amazing! It fits really well and it’s perfect. I love the graphic and this sweater is definitely going to be heavily used.
Nice color nice logo fitting good!

This sweater is the greatest garment to ever exist.I was a huge fan of "Untitled Goose Game", and I feel like the protagonist really captures my approach to life.  This sweater captures that energy in a garment, and when I saw it available for review I had to have it.It is everything I dreamed it would be and more.This is actually a really, really nice sweater.  It's not just a novelty - it's like, as comfortable as the several-hundred-dollar fancy sweater I got for Christmas a few years back.  This thing is no joke.  As you can see from the attached photos, the design is properly woven in all the way through - this isn't a junky applique or patch, it's a straight up finely crafted garment.  Totally unexpected.  If you told me this was from a major luxury brand, I'd actually believe you.  The fit is great - I was concerned because the listing showed a weird curvature around the shoulders, but it's cut normally in real life.Let's talk about that design, because wow.  It's a winner.  It's a goose (the listing says duck, but we all know better.)  It says WOW.  It's absurdist and a conversation starter and exactly what streetwear is all about.  I adore it.The design is actually a little low on the sweater - I wish it was about an inch and a half higher.  For me, it happens to work amazingly because I have a long beard that would otherwise obscure it.  For most people, I think you'll find the design to be a little on the low side.  Nothing unmanageable, though.If you're a little more edgy, you might prefer the pink version, where the goose is holding a knife and the caption says 'murder'.  To be honest, I pushed the order button so fast on the blue variant I didn't see the pink one.  I might have ordered that one if I'd seen it first.  They're both probably amazing.  I'm not sad I have this one, though.I gleefully showed my new sweater to a friend who is also a goose fan, and he said he would have ordered one of his own on the spot if it was captioned HONK instead.  I don't disagree with his take - maybe a third future design for Laixton to expand their offerings?  But I still kind of love the WOW messaging on mine.Eleventy billion stars.  I literally was pacing back and forth in front of my door waiting for Amazon to bring me this garment.  I can't wait to wear it out and about.  This has brought me more mirth than just about any other purchase I've made in recent memory.  You need this sweater.Wow.

Get ready for the wow factor right out of the package for this fantastic warm sweater. The quality is just amazing once you see and feel the richness of the material.  Key thing to keep in mind is that this is an oversized sweater. I actually got this for my 15 year old in size Medium and although I wear a large,  I could easily wear this around ( I'm 5'11and215lbs). This is truly a well-made product making it an impressive warm gift for anyone. Highly recommended.
really soft! Love it.
